titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning the basis and original of government with the absolute and indispensable necessity of it : wherein the excellency of monarchy above any other kind is evidently demonstrated : as it was delivered by way of charge to the grand-jury, at a quarter-sessions of the peace held at Ipswich in the county of Suffolk / by F.T., Esq., one of His Majesty's justices of the peace for the said county.
titleStmt.author: Theobald, Francis, Sir, d. 1670.

titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning the basis and original of government with the absolute and indispensable necessity of it : wherein the excellency of monarchy above any other kind is evidently demonstrated : as it was delivered by way of charge to the grand-jury, at a quarter-sessions of the peace held at Ipswich in the county of Suffolk / by F.T., Esq., one of His Majesty's justices of the peace for the said county.
titleStmt.author: Theobald, Francis, Sir, d. 1670.
Thynne, Francis, 1545?-1608.

notesStmt.note: Written by Francis Theobald; sometimes attributed to Francis Thynne. Cf. BM; NUC pre-1956.
Printer and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
